description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Oct-26 03:51:57

BSDateTime_Start.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of this battery session data event.

BSDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total duration of this battery session data event.

BSChargeDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the time that the Asset's/Truck's battery spent being charged during this battery session data event.

BSDischargeDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the time that the Asset's/Truck's battery spent being discharged during this battery session data event.

BSSessionID.description: Units: Integer. Battery Session ID, increments every new session.

BMS_StateOfCharge.description: Units: Percent. Current state of charge of Asset's/Truck's battery. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BSStateOfChargeInitial.description: Units: Percent. Initial state of charge of Asset's/Truck's battery at the start of this battery session data event. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BSAverageVoltage.description: Units: 0.0625 V/Bit. Average voltage of the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSAverageCurrentIn.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Average charge current delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSPeakCurrentIn.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Peak charge current delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSPeakCurrentOut.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Peak current sourced from the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSAverageCurrentOut.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Average current sourced from the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSMinBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Minimum Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery session data event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BSPeakBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Peak Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery session data event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BSAverageBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Average Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery session data event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

CCF.description: Units: CCF. The current Continuous Charge Factor of the Asset's/Truck's battery.

Charging.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's battery is currently being charged.

BatteryOverTemp.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's battery is currently over temperature.

LowStateOfCharge.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's battery state of charge is considered low.

BSEnergyIn.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSEnergyOut.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the watt-hours removed from the Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery session data event.

BSEnergyRemaining.description: Units: Joule. Indicates the Energy remaining in the Asset's/Truck's battery at the end of this battery session data event.

BSUsageAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the ampere-hours sourced from the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery session data event.

BSAHRemaining.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the Asset's/Truck's battery current number of ampere-hours remaining at the end of the battery data session event.

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
